sourceMeaningMnemonic: <radical>Say</radical> "<radical>two</radical> <radical>big</radical> <radical>prison</radical>s" with <kanji>pride</kanji>! Nobody said you can't have pride after serving time in two big prisons. So say it with your chest!
meaningInfo: Imagine really puffing out your chest and saying, "Yes, two big prisons!", with all the pride you can muster.
readingMnemonic: After mustering all your <kanji>pride</kanji>, you feel like a new person, reborn almost. "I feel like a <ja><reading>子</reading></ja> (<ja>こ</ja>) again!", you proclaim to the world.
readingInfo: With your regained, child-like pride, you venture out into the world after spending way too much time in those two big prisons. A new life awaits you, good luck!
